title: Mobile-Based BLS (Basic Life Support) Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: BLS Skill Acquisition Program for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers in a Smartphone-Based Microlearning Environment, Considering Accessibility in Limited Technological Settings

learning_goals: Learners can accurately determine a cardiac arrest patient’s respiratory status within 10 seconds
Learners can perform correct chest compression for adults (depth of 5-6 cm, rate of 100-120 per minute) within 2 minutes
Learners master pad placement and shock procedures through at least three AED (automated external defibrillator) simulation sessions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
